verses.verse: In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H2403>sin<s%> and for <S%H5079>uncleanness.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H6091>idols<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered:<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> I will <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and the <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> shall <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> then his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begot<s%> him shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> that <S%H3205>begot<s%> him shall thrust him <S%H1856>through<s%> when he <S%H5012>prophesieth.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>vision,<s%> <S%H2384><s%> when he hath <S%H5012>prophesied;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3847>wear<s%> a <S%H8181>rough<s%> <S%H155>garment<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> deceive: <S%H3584><s%>

But he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am a <S%H376>husbandman;<s%> <S%H5647><s%> <S%H127><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> taught me to keep <S%H7069>cattle<s%> from my <S%H4480>youth.<s%> <S%H5271><s%>

And one shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H4100>What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4347>wounds<s%> <S%H996>in<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands?<s%> Then he shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> Those with <S%H834>which<s%> I was <S%H5221>wounded<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H157>friends.<s%>

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> O <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1397>man<s%> that is my <S%H5997>fellow,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered:<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the little <S%H6819>ones.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6310>parts<s%> therein shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> and <S%H1478>die;<s%> but the <S%H7992>third<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left<s%> therein.

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the third <S%H7992>part<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and will <S%H6884>refine<s%> them <S%H853>as<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H6884>refined,<s%> and will <S%H974>try<s%> them <S%H853>as<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H974>tried:<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6030>hear<s%> them: I will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> is my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H1931>they<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H430>God.<s%>
